activation.ReallyYourEmail: Ko tenei tonu to wahitau imeera, {{1}}? Ki te pera, paatohia a konei ki te tautuhi i to kupuhipa me te whakahohe i to putea.
activation.SeeYou: Ka kite koe i runga {{2}} !

LinkToUnsubscribe: Anei he hononga ki te whakakore i te ohaurunga ki te kore koe e hiahia ki te tiki atu i etahi atu imeera.

charge.HasBeenCharged: Kia ora, he korero noa tenei ki a koe {{1}} kua utua {{2}} mo {{3}} e {{4}}

charged.HavePaid: Kia ora {{1}}, he whakapumautanga tere noa tenei kua pai to utu {{2}} ki {{3}} mo {{4}}

resend.YouAreReceiving: Kei te whiwhi koe i tenei imeera na te mea i uru tetahi ki to wahitau imeera me te panui "kua wareware ki te kīangahipa". Mena ehara i a koe, waiho noa tenei karere.
resend.Reset: Hei tautuhi i to kīangahipa, pawhiria {{1}}

subscription.YouHaveStarted: Kia ora {{1}}, kua timata koe i to ohaurunga ki {{2}} me {{3}} i {{4}} mo {{5}} marama.
subscription.HasStarted: He mea noa tenei kia mohio koe {{1}}, kua timata ta ratou ohaurunga ki {{2}} me {{3}} i {{4}} mo {{5}} marama.
